original_text: Peter then said, ‘People of Israel, listen to what I am saying! Jesus, the man from Nazareth, came with God's authority to do his work. God did many powerful and special things through him. These miracles showed you clearly that God had sent him. You know about all this. These things happened here, and you saw them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람들아 이 말을 들으라 너희도 아는 바와 같이 하나님께서 나사렛 예수로 큰 권능과 기사와 표적을 너희 가운데서 베푸사 너희 앞에서 그를 증언하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: People of Israel, listen to what I am saying
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들아, 내가 하는 말을 들어라

sentences.original_text: came with God's authority to do his work
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 권위를 가지고 그의 일을 하러 오셨다

sentences.original_text: God did many powerful and special things through him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그를 통해 많은 강력하고 특별한 일들을 하셨다
